title: Top Places to visit in Kondagaon, Chhattisgarh
content: Kondagaon a municipality about 70 kilometers from Jagdalpur city is the headquarter of Kondagaon district in the Indian state of Chhattisgarh. Kondagaon separated from Bastar district on 24 January 2012 and formed as 27th District of the Chhattisgarh state. It is mostly renowned for its bell meta
